entry.title: BIP proposal - patch to raise selfish mining threshold.
entry.summary: The email conversation is discussing the potential for an attack on Bitcoin and the need to fix any vulnerabilities. Although there are counter-measures based on human intervention that could stop an attack in the short term, it is important to address any potential exploits quickly. The discussion mentions a flaw identified by Gregory Maxwell in a proposed solution, highlighting the need for careful consideration and thorough analysis of the issue. Overall, while there may be smart people planning attacks on Bitcoin, the conversation emphasizes the importance of taking the time to review and discuss potential solutions before rushing to implement them.
